```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(plotly)
library(leaflet)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(ggthemes)
```


```{r}
ufo_sightings <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-06-25/ufo_sightings.csv")
ufo_sightings_us <- ufo_sightings %>%
  dplyr::filter(country == 'us') %>%
  dplyr::mutate(date_time = mdy_hm(date_time), 
                date_documented = mdy(date_documented),
                sighting_year = year(date_time))


ufo_sightings_co <- ufo_sightings_us %>%
  filter(state == "co")
  
ufo_map <- leaflet(ufo_sightings_co) %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addCircleMarkers()
ufo_map # Print the 




```

```{r}
ufo_sightings_co %>%
  group_by(sighting_year) %>%
  summarize(`Sighting Count` = n()) %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = sighting_year, y = `Sighting Count`) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_clean()
```
